descriptionEnglish: Undead and Demon enemies within 25 yards take {c_magic}[{VALUE1}*100]%{/c_magic} weapon damage as Holy every second and are sometimes knocked into the air.
Killing enemies and destroying objects has a chance to grant 20% of your maximum primary resource.
{c_magic}[{VALUE1} * 100]%{/c_magic} chance to cast a fireball when attacking.
Teleport gains the effect of the Wormhole rune.
You take {c_magic}[{VALUE1}*100]%{/c_magic} less damage from blocked attacks.
Blocks have a chance of summoning a charging wolf that deals {c_magic}[{VALUE1}*100]%{/c_magic} weapon damage to all enemies it passes through.
Blocks have a chance of summoning a charging wolf that deals {c_magic}[{VALUE1}*100]%{/c_magic} weapon damage to all enemies it passes through.
{c_magic}[{VALUE1} * 100]%{/c_magic} chance to shoot explosive bolts when attacking.
